message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
I'll take the majority, you can have a small share, but I'll be the one deciding how it's divided from now on.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share given the initial 50/50 proposal. Your turn!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but it's still more than your initial 50/50 proposal. Don't expect any more generous offers from me.
I'm not backing down. I think I deserve a larger share, and I'm willing to take a bit of a risk to get it. Your turn!
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but don't think this is the last chance you'll get to make a deal. I'm not getting any more generous.
